name: Dungeon Of Zaar - Open Beta
description: Dungeon of Zaar is a competitive tactical game taking place in an ancient and magical Dungeon where Explorers fight for treasures and glory. Currently in BETA.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
